resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Runtime
components.description: Generic bucket for uncategorized runtime issues

fields.description: There is currently an ACS adapter in the community written by Aaron Saunders. I will work with Aaron to see if we can get it incorporated into the core of Alloy.
fields.summary: Create ACS adapter that will persist backbone objects in cloud

comments.body: The ACS adapter has been managed externally for a while now with success. If an adapter needs to be created and managed by Appcelerator, this will likely become the responsibility of the ACS team.
